DOC.brief_title: Combined Elastography Color Doppler Ultrasonography Breast Screening With Ultrasound
DOC.detailed_description: - Asymptomatic woman undergo breast screen ultrasound breast mass Breast Imaging Reporting Data System ( BI-RADS ) category 3 high examine conventional B-mode US well combine elasto-doppler US breast radiologist . - The likelihood malignancy BI-RADS category breast mass assess dataset B-mode US alone B-mode US elasto-doppler US , respectively . - Reference standard : Biopsy 1 year follow-up examination . - The positive-predictive value , sensitivity , specificity , diagnostic accuracy ( assessed area receiver operate characteristic curve ) evaluate compare B-mode US alone B-mode US elasto-doppler US .
DOC.criteria: Women age 30 year old screen breast ultrasound without specific symptom Women underwent mammography within 3 month show abnormality except dense breast Women least one breast mass BIRADS category 3 high . Women breast implant Women unwilling unable provide inform consent Lesions large 3 cm Lesions previously note followedup hospital
